        min - - user-chosen estimated time (minutes)
        task - - user-typed task description
        prior - - user-chosen priority of the task

      • fillTable

        void fillTable(javax.swing.JTable tbl,
               java.util.ArrayList<Task> tasks)
        For every record in task ArrayList calculates proper time representation (from long representing milliseconds of time to the end of the task to the proper, user friendly format. Then it fills every column with proper data - name, prior, and time
        Parameters:
        tbl - - JTable that needs to be filled with data
        tasks - - ArrayList of data witch which table is needed to be filled

                   boolean minute)
        Parsing time in milliseconds from VTCW displayed timeString
        Parameters:
        time - - String representation of time to be parsed to int
